name: Ropable
description:
Ropeable is a 2d rope-action platformer where a little soul who loves sushi hits the road. It's free!

○ How to play

- Mouse Left-click :: Hang the rope

- Mouse Right-click: Cut the rope

- Mousewheel Scroll Up/Down While Hanging the rope: Scroll dash up/down

○ What's included

- 10 levels (short and sweet!)

- Online Leaderboard where you can boast of your skills. Optimize your moves and get on the top! Using less ropes is the key.

- Relaxing music and comfy atmospheres

Thank you for playing my game!
